009
010package imagingbook.pub.threshold.global;
011
012/**
013 * Minimum Error thresholder after Kittler and Illingworth (1986).
014 */
015public class MinErrorThresholder extends GlobalThresholder {
016        
017        static final double EPSILON = 1E-12;
018        
019        private double[] S2_0, S2_1;
020        private int N;
021        
022        public MinErrorThresholder() {
023                super();
024        }
025        
026        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
027                int K = h.length;
028                makeSigmaTables(h);     // set up S2_0, S2_1, N
029
030                int n0 = 0, n1;
031                int qMin = -1;
032                double eMin = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
033                for (int q = 0; q <= K-2; q++) {
034                        n0 = n0 + h[q];
035                        n1 = N - n0;
036                        if (n0 > 0 && n1 > 0) { 
037                                double P0 = (double) n0 / N;    // could use n0, n1 instead
038                                double P1 = (double) n1 / N;
039                                double e = // 1.0 + 
040                                        P0 * Math.log(S2_0[q]) + P1 * Math.log(S2_1[q])
041                                        - 2 * (P0 * Math.log(P0) + P1 * Math.log(P1));
042                                if (e < eMin) {         // minimize e;
043                                        eMin = e;
044                                        qMin = q;
045                                }
046                        }
047                }
048                return qMin; 
049        }
050        
051        private void makeSigmaTables(int[] h) {
052                int K = h.length;
053                final double unitVar = 1d/12;   // variance of a uniform distribution in unit interval
054                S2_0 = new double[K];
055                S2_1 = new double[K];
056                
057                int n0 = 0;
058                long A0 = 0;
059                long B0 = 0; 
060                for (int q = 0; q < K; q++) {
061                        long ql = q;    // need a long type to avoid overflows
062                        n0 = n0 + h[q];
063                        A0 = A0 + h[q] * ql;
064                        B0 = B0 + h[q] * ql*ql;
065                        S2_0[q] = (n0 > 0) ? 
066                                        unitVar + ((double)B0 - (double)A0*A0/n0)/n0 : 0;       
067                }
068                
069                N = n0;
070                
071                int n1 = 0;
072                long A1 = 0;
073                long B1 = 0; 
074                S2_1[K-1] = 0;
075                for (int q = K-2; q >= 0; q--) {
076                        long qp1 = q+1;
077                        n1 = n1 + h[q+1];
078                        A1 = A1 + h[q+1] * qp1;
079                        B1 = B1 + h[q+1] * qp1*qp1;
080                        S2_1[q] = (n1 > 0) ? 
081                                        unitVar + ((double)B1 - (double)A1*A1/n1)/n1 : 0;
082                }
083        }
084        
085}
